AU.name: Wrecking Crew
AU.description: In NES™ classic Wrecking Crew, Mario and Luigi swap their plumber’s caps for hard hats as they take on the role of demolition engineers! One or two players must demolish every obstacle in each enemy-infested level, while working out the most destructive route through the networks of ladders and scaffolds. Wrecking Crew also includes a mode for designing your own levels. This Virtual Console™ version also features the ability to save your creations, which was not possible in the NES original.

BG.name: Wrecking Crew
BG.description: In NES™ classic Wrecking Crew, Mario and Luigi swap their plumber’s caps for hard hats as they take on the role of demolition engineers! One or two players must demolish every obstacle in each enemy-infested level, while working out the most destructive route through the networks of ladders and scaffolds. Wrecking Crew also includes a mode for designing your own levels. This Virtual Console™ version also features the ability to save your creations, which was not possible in the NES original.

BE.name: Wrecking Crew
BE.description: Dans ce grand classique NES™, Mario et Luigi abandonnent la plomberie pour se transformer en experts de la démolition ! Traversez des niveaux infestés d'ennemis en solo ou avec un ami, empruntez des échelles et des échafaudages vertigineux, et démolissez les obstacles sur votre chemin ! Wrecking Crew vous permet de créer vos propres niveaux. Cette version console virtuelle™ permet également de sauvegarder vos créations, ce qui était impossible sur la version NES originale.

DK.name: Wrecking Crew

DE.name: Wrecking Crew
DE.description: Im NES™-Klassiker Wrecking Crew tauschen Mario und Luigi ihre Klempnermützen gegen Schutzhelme. Die haben sie als Abbruchexperten auch dringend nötig! Ein oder zwei Spieler müssen jedes Hindernis in den gegnerverseuchten Leveln beseitigen, während sie die zerstörerischste Route zwischen Leitern und Gerüsten finden müssen. Wrecking Crew enthält auch einen Leveleditor. Im Gegensatz zum Original kannst du deine Kreationen in der Virtual Console™-Version sogar speichern.

ES.name: Wrecking Crew
ES.description: En Wrecking Crew, el clásico de NES™, Mario y Luigi dejan a un lado la fontanería para convertirse en... ¡ingenieros de demoliciones! En cada nivel infestado de enemigos, uno o dos jugadores tendrán que demoler todos los obstáculos mientras buscan la ruta más destructiva en el entramado de escaleras y andamios. Wrecking Crew te permite también editar tus propios niveles. Además, en la consola virtual™ podrás guardar los niveles que edites, algo que no era posible en el juego de NES.

IT.name: Wrecking Crew
IT.description: Wrecking Crew è un classico NES™ in cui Mario e Luigi abbandonano i loro cappellini da idraulico e assumono il ruolo di ingegneri demolitori! In questo gioco, per uno o due giocatori, dovrai demolire tutti gli ostacoli presenti nei livelli infestati da nemici e farti strada su e giù per le scale e le impalcature degli edifici. Wrecking Crew include anche una modalità Editor che ti permette di creare livelli personalizzati. In questa versione per Virtual Console™ potrai inoltre salvare le tue creazioni, usufruendo di una novità assoluta rispetto al titolo originale per NES.

PL.name: Wrecking Crew
PL.description: In NES™ classic Wrecking Crew, Mario and Luigi swap their plumber’s caps for hard hats as they take on the role of demolition engineers! NL.name: Wrecking Crew
NL.description: In de NES™-klassieker Wrecking Crew wisselen Mario en Lugi hun loodgieterspetten in voor bouwhelmen en gaan ze aan de slag als vakkundig slopers! Een of twee spelers moeten alle obstakels in een level afbreken terwijl ze de meest destructieve route door een netwerk van ladders en steigers afleggen. Wrecking Crew heeft een spelstand waarnmee je je eigen levels kunt ontwerpen. Nieuw aan de Virtual Console™-versie van Wrecking Crew is de mogelijkheid je ontwerpen op te slaan, iets dat niet mogelijk was in het originele spel voor de NES.

RU.name: Wrecking Crew
RU.description: Марио и Луиджи променяли свои знаменитые кепки на каски: в этой классической игре для NES они стали специалистами по сносу и разрушению! Вы можете играть в одиночку или с другом. На каждом уровне вас ждет множество врагов и стены, которые необходимо превратить в пыль и щебенку. Распланируйте свой путь по строительным лесам таким образом, чтобы обрушить как можно больше препятствий! В Wrecking Crew также есть режим создания собственных уровней, а в версии для «Виртуальной консоли» вы можете сохранять свои творения (раньше это было невозможно).

RO.name: Wrecking Crew
RO.description: In NES™ classic Wrecking Crew, Mario and Luigi swap their plumber’s caps for hard hats as they take on the role of demolition engineers! One or two players must demolish every obstacle in each enemy-infested level, while working out the most destructive route through the networks of ladders and scaffolds. Wrecking Crew also includes a mode for designing your own levels. This Virtual Console™ version also features the ability to save your creations, which was not possible in the NES original.

PT.name: Wrecking Crew
PT.description: Em Wrecking Crew, o clássico para a NES™, Mario e Luigi trocam os seus bonés de canalizadores por capacetes ao tornarem-se engenheiros de demolição! Em cada nível infestado de inimigos, um ou dois jogadores têm que demolir todos os obstáculos, enquanto tentam encontrar a rota mais destrutiva entre o emaranhado de escadas e andaimes. Wrecking Crew inclui ainda um modo que te permite criar os teus próprios níveis. Esta versão para a Consola Virtual™ oferece ainda a possibilidade de guardar as tuas criações, algo que não era possível na versão original para a NES.
